title: Panel of presiding officers announced for 354th Senate session
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 30 (APP): Secretary Senate Syed Hasnain Haider on Tuesday announced the panel of Presiding officers to act in absence of both the Chairman and Deputy Chairman.
The panel of Presiding officers comprises Senators Sherry Rehman, Khalil Tahir Mandokhail and Manzoor Ahmed Kakar.
Presiding Officer Sherry Rehman chaired the proceedings of the 254th Senate session, commenced on the very day.
